subprocess_flow.description: Define the framework for continuously monitoring data governance practices and ensuring compliance with policies, standards, and regulations. This includes identifying key compliance indicators, setting monitoring frequencies, and establishing reporting mechanisms. The framework should align with the organization's risk management and compliance objectives.

Conduct regular audits to assess adherence to data governance policies, data quality standards, and data access procedures. This involves reviewing data samples, system logs, and user access records. Audits should be conducted by independent auditors or compliance officers.

subprocess_flow.substep_name: Track Data Breaches and Security Incidents
subprocess_flow.description: Establish a process for tracking data breaches and security incidents. This involves documenting the nature of the incident, the scope of the data affected, and the actions taken to contain and remediate the incident. Data breaches and security incidents should be reported to the appropriate authorities and stakeholders.
success_criteria: Timely detection and reporting of data breaches and security incidents

subprocess_flow.description: Establish a process for addressing compliance issues identified through audits, monitoring, or incident reports. This involves investigating the root cause of the issue, developing a remediation plan, and implementing corrective actions. Compliance issues should be resolved in a timely and effective manner.
dependencies: Track Data Breaches and Security Incidents
success_criteria: Timely and effective resolution of compliance issues

subprocess_flow.description: Generate regular compliance reports to document adherence to data governance policies, standards, and regulations. These reports should summarize the results of audits, monitoring activities, and incident investigations. Compliance reports should be shared with key stakeholders, including executive leadership and the Data Governance Committee.
success_criteria: Regular and accurate compliance reports generated and distributed
